title: Fire Beach
description: Paradise is burning.She’s going after the Shroud Killer—by herself.Detective Lei Texeira has had enough of an elusive enemy that strikes at her by hitting the ones she loves. Taking matters into her own hands, she stalks a killer to the Big Island, uncovering old vendettas and new tragedies.Meanwhile… he just loves fire.Fire is cleansing. Fire is beauty. Fire is pure power, and a pyromaniac tangles with Michael Stevens in a case that catches the innocent in raging flames.
author: Toby Neal
